statistics.resources: select ?resource (count(*) as ?frequency) from <http://musicbrainz.org> where { [] a ?resource } group by ?resource order by desc(?frequency)
statistics.predicates: select ?predicate (count(*) as ?frequency) from <http://musicbrainz.org> where { [] ?predicate ?obj . filter(isLiteral(?obj)) . } group by ?predicate order by desc(?frequency)

questions.question: Give me all bands whose name starts with The.
questions.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?artist FROM <http://musicbrainz.org> WHERE { ?artist rdf:type mo:MusicGroup . ?artist foaf:name ?name . FILTER (regex(?name, '^The ')) . }

questions.question: Give me all songs by Gojira.
questions.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?song FROM <http://musicbrainz.org> WHERE { ?song rdf:type mo:Track . ?artist foaf:made ?song . ?artist foaf:name 'Gojira' . }

questions.question: Give me all songs by Aretha Franklin.
questions.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?track FROM <http://musicbrainz.org> WHERE { ?artist foaf:name 'Aretha Franklin' . ?artist foaf:made ?track . ?track rdf:type mo:Track . }

questions.question: Which songs by Miles Davis are longer than 20 minutes?
questions.keywords: Miles Davis, song, length over 20 minutes
questions.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?track FROM <http://musicbrainz.org> FROM <http://musicbrainz.org> WHERE { ?track rdf:type mo:Track . ?artist foaf:made ?track . ?artist foaf:name 'Miles Davis' . ?track mo:duration ?duration . FILTER( ?duration > 1200000 ). }

questions.question: Which groups was David Bowie a member of?
questions.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?band FROM <http://musicbrainz.org> WHERE { ?artist foaf:name 'David Bowie' . ?artist mo:member_of ?band . }

questions.question: Give me all albums from Michael Jackson
questions.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?album FROM <http://musicbrainz.org> WHERE { ?artist foaf:made ?album . ?artist foaf:name 'Michael Jackson' . ?album dbp:thisAlbum ?album_title . }

questions.question: Which artists were born on May 30th?
questions.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?artist FROM <http://musicbrainz.org> WHERE { ?artist a mo:MusicArtist . ?artist dbo:birthDate ?date . filter(regex(?date, "5-30$", "i")) . }

questions.question: Give me all Kraftwerk albums!
questions.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?album FROM <http://musicbrainz.org> WHERE { ?artist foaf:made ?album . ?artist foaf:name 'Kraftwerk' . ?album dbp:thisAlbum ?album_title . }

questions.question: Which artists were born on the 30th of September 1964?
questions.query: SELECT ?artist FROM <http://musicbrainz.org> WHERE { ?artist a mo:MusicArtist . ?artist dbo:birthDate ?date . filter(?date = "1964-09-30") . }

questions.question: Give me all bands which broke up in 2010
questions.query: SELECT distinct ?band FROM <http://musicbrainz.org> WHERE { ?band a mo:MusicGroup . ?band dbo:activeYearsEndYear ?end_year . ?band dbo:activeYearsStartYear ?start_year . filter(?start_year != ?end_year) . filter(?end_year = "2010") . }
